data.title: Sushi Pick up
data.text: We like to order sushi to go and take it home. Always friendly service and great food. The combo plates are also popular with some of our sushi-phobic friends.

data.title: Family Sushi Night
data.text: Quick service for the family sushi night. Have tried most of the rolls and they have all been great.

data.title: Enjoyed our lunch
data.text:
Never having been here and with my wife not a sushi person, we both came away happy with having dined here.
I had Udon noodles with beef and my wife had a terriyaki chicken bowl. The only thing she would have liked was more vegetables and less rice.
Sushi looked good and something that I will give a try the next time we visit.

data.title: Quick service, good eats
data.text: My coworkers and I come here on a pretty regular basis for sushi. The staff is friendly and welcoming, The quality is always fresh and you can watch the guys make it. The only thing I wouldn't recommend is their Ramen bowls. Not saying it is bad just not as good as some other places I've had. Try the Maki Yaki special is fantastic.
